chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Modifier-Alcohol Conc. (.20-.249)] and Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Modifier-Alcohol Conc. (.20-.249)]. The defendant was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Modifier-Alcohol Conc. (.20-.249)] and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Modifier-Alcohol Conc. (.20-.249)] was dismissed by the court.

  • Gerald W Plagge was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Modifier-Alcohol Conc. (.20-.249)], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $1000 cash bond applied.  Defendant to pay $50 a month

Def to undergo Alcohol and Drug Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations.
.

Do not possess or consume any alcohol

No driving during period of supervision

No bars or taverns
.

Pay DOC supervision fees

Complete inpatient treatment he is signed up for with the VA

Random testing

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or govermental entities for the balance due.  All available actions will be used to collect the debt.

timeConds.notes: Jail can be served in Jackson County Jail with work release.  He is taken into custody now to be booked and then he will have 2 1/2 hours to transport himself to Jackson County

From: Jeri Marsolek Re: state has no objection to amending JOC to Time Served
RAG: amend JOC to time served

Court grants 30 day furlough to give State opportunity to gather what information they need so Mr Plagge can get his services at the VA and we will address his sentence after that.
Internal Review in 30 days if there is no stipulation, I will set it for further hearing.

for Sentence Modification  for furlough while at hospital

from Colin, LCJ   re: Def came back from Jackson Co yesterday - he was serving his sentence on Huber w/ them & they must have kicked him out for drinking, so he is serving his sentence in LCJ.  Not sure if you wanted to set up Hrg w/ him or not - wanted to keep CRT posted.

To be taken into custody today & be booked & then def will have 2 1/2 hour furlough to transport yourself from here to Jackson Co
